component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: - display correct sentence with rule hints after task submission
- display correct sentence with rule hints after task submission
- rule and sentence corrections - questionnaire corrections
- authentication via url parameter (for Stud.IP embedding) - connection to django auth user system - rule counter - rule expanation formatting
- changed rule order - reduced number of rules to 30 - metadata is stored explicitly - finishing message on uplevel screen
- fixed bug in rule file formatting
- bootstrap grid changed to col-xs- - uname parameter wins over session cookie

- introduce active and inactive sentences - sentence import script handles multiple files and can deactivate all old sentences - introduce comma pairs - make boostrap container depend on iframe embedding
- SolutionRules introduced - Fixed minor bugs in rule list - Handling of unbalanced optional commas for 'set comma' task - Reworked client evaluation code for 'set comma' task
- Handling of unbalanced optional commas for 'correct comma' task - Reworked client evaluation code for 'correct comma' task
- bugfix: handle empty possible_sentence list in roulette_wheel_selection
- add admin views - ensure that new username is > 8 chars
- 3rd party cookie bugfix - change probabilites of task types
- user cleanup command - repair restart /reset view
- user cleanup command - repair restart /reset view
- user cleanup command - repair restart /reset view
fixed get_Value() function, now faster in next rule but does not continue after next rule
fixed get_Value() function, now faster in next rule but does not continue after next rule
selects new rule and set it as current

MESSAGE.value: - fixed bug in rule file formatting

- introduce active and inactive sentences - sentence import script handles multiple files and can deactivate all old sentences - introduce comma pairs - make boostrap container depend on iframe embedding
- SolutionRules introduced - Fixed minor bugs in rule list - Handling of unbalanced optional commas for 'set comma' task - Reworked client evaluation code for 'set comma' task
- Handling of unbalanced optional commas for 'correct comma' task - Reworked client evaluation code for 'correct comma' task
- bugfix: handle empty possible_sentence list in roulette_wheel_selection
- add admin views - ensure that new username is > 8 chars
- 3rd party cookie bugfix - change probabilites of task types
- user cleanup command - repair restart /reset view
